about_the_game:
Game introduction
The 'Ball Bounce' game, a nostalgic flash game from the 2000s, can be converted into a 3D game to bring back memories to players and provide visual satisfaction with advanced graphics. In terms of gameplay, we made it so that you can feel the strategic and urgent fun of clearing the game by double jumping or moving to a specific area.

Game Story
The curious “D. “Alpha” is a cool robot. While flying freely in the sky, he sees a cool space ship and enters the space ship **This is a story about him causing a riot and behaving badly**. The angry owners of the space ship say “D. This is a story about trying to chase away “Alpha”.

Operations
Movement : ← , →
Skill: Space
Option: ESC

Game Rules

▶ If the player falls to his death or hits a red object, he dies!
▶ If you collide with a boss object, you die.


▶ When the player uses a skill on the rail, the rail moves!
▶ If you use skills on the jump block, you can jump higher!
▶ Be careful because the box will fall if you step on it!
▶ When the player approaches the teleport, they are teleported to a specific area!
▶ Blocks with arrows fly in a specific direction when the player enters them!
▶ If you step on the garbage block, it disappears!
▶ Never, ever step on the button..... Until here.
